description:
Genesis` palace begins to fall apart as the self-destruct sequence is initiated. Loud rumbling noises sound througout the palace, and columns and walls begin to collapse. Yasaka is crushed under falling debris while trying to protect Erika and Fei-He, and he is swallowed by the flames...
Meanwhile, in the research lab located in the deepest parts of the palace, Simeon learns what Himuka has been hiding underneath his mask.
"Himuka, huh? I don`t need that name anymore."
With one piercing blue eye and one of brilliant gold, Himuka had been deceiving and using Simeon.
Source: crunchyroll
